mapper.select: select id, detection_time as detectionTime, camera_location as cameraLocation, detection_x as detectionX, detection_y as detectionY, detection_w as detectionW, detection_h as detectionH, gender, age from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record)
select gender,count(gender) as count from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record) group by gender

select nnd as name,count(*) as value from ( select case when age>=1 and 10>=age then '1-10岁' when age>=11 and 20>=age then '11-20岁' when age>=21 and 30>=age then '21-30岁' when age>=31 and 40>=age then '31-40岁' else '其他' end as nnd,age from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record) ) a group by nnd
select detection_time as detectionTime,count(1) as count from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record)
select detection_x as detectionX, detection_y as detectionY from record where detection_time=(SELECT MAX(detection_time) FROM record)
